028import org.bouncycastle.openpgp.PGPSignatureGenerator;

030import org.bouncycastle.util.encoders.Hex;
031import org.vafer.jdeb.changes.ChangeSet;

062/**
063 * A generic class for creating Debian archives. Even supports signed changes
064 * files.
065 */
066public class DebMaker {
067
068    private static final int DEFAULT_MODE = 33188;
069
070    /** A console to output log message with */
071    private Console console;
072
073    /** The Debian package produced */
074    private File deb;
075
076    /** The directory containing the control files to build the package */
077    private File control;
078
079    /** The character character encoding to use when reading control and changes files */
080    private Charset encoding = Charset.defaultCharset();
081
082    /** The name of the package. Default value if not specified in the control file */
083    private String packageName;
084
085    /** The section of the package. Default value if not specified in the control file */
086    private String section = "java";
087
088    /** The dependencies of the package. */
089    private String depends;
090
091    /** The description of the package. Default value if not specified in the control file */
092    private String description;
093
094    /** The homepage of the application. Default value if not specified in the control file */
095    private String homepage;
096
097    /** The file containing the PGP keys */
098    private File keyring;
099
100    /** The key to use in the keyring */
101    private String key;
102
103    /** The passphrase for the key to sign the changes file */
104    private String passphrase;
105
106    /** The file to read the changes from */
107    private File changesIn;
108
109    /** The file where to write the changes to */
110    private File changesOut;
111
112    /** The file where to write the changes of the changes input to */
113    private File changesSave;
114
115    /** Enable the creation of the changes file */
116    private boolean changesEnabled;
117
118    /** The compression method used for the data file (none, gzip, bzip2 or xz) */
119    private String compression = "gzip";
120
121    /** Whether to sign the package that is created */
122    private boolean signPackage;
123
124    /** Whether to sign the changes file that is created */
125    private boolean signChanges;
126
127    /** Defines which utility is used to verify the signed package */
128    private String signMethod;
129
130    /** Defines the role to sign with */
131    private String signRole;
132
133    /** Defines the digest for the signing */
134    private String signDigest = "SHA256";
135
136    /** Defines the longFileMode of the tar file that is built */
137    private String tarLongFileMode;
138
139    /** Defines the bigNumberMode of the tar file that is built */
140    private String tarBigNumberMode;
141
142    /** Whether to ignore broken symlinks in DataBuilder */
143    private boolean ignoreBrokenLinks;
144
145    private Long outputTimestampMs;
146
147    private VariableResolver variableResolver;
148    private String openReplaceToken = FilteredFile.DEFAULT_OPEN_TOKEN;
149    private String closeReplaceToken = FilteredFile.DEFAULT_CLOSE_TOKEN;
150
151    private final Collection<DataProducer> dataProducers = new ArrayList<>();
152
153    private final Collection<DataProducer> conffilesProducers = new ArrayList<>();
154    private String digest = "SHA256";
155
156    public DebMaker(Console console, Collection<DataProducer> dataProducers, Collection<DataProducer> conffileProducers) {
157        this.console = console;
158        if (dataProducers != null) {
159            this.dataProducers.addAll(dataProducers);
160        }
161        if (conffileProducers != null) {
162            this.conffilesProducers.addAll(conffileProducers);
163        }
164
165        Security.addProvider(new BouncyCastleProvider());
166    }
167
168    public void setDeb(File deb) {
169        this.deb = deb;
170    }

172    public void setControl(File control) {
173        this.control = control;
174    }
175
176    public void setEncoding(Charset encoding) {
177        this.encoding = encoding;
178    }
179
180    public void setEncoding(String encoding) {
181        if (encoding == null || encoding.isEmpty()) {
182            this.encoding = Charset.defaultCharset();
183        } else {
184            this.encoding = Charset.forName(encoding);
185        }
186    }

269    private boolean isWritableFile(File file) {
270        return !file.exists() || file.isFile() && file.canWrite();
271    }
272
273    public String getDigest() {
274        return digest;
275    }
276
277    public void setDigest(String digest) {
278        this.digest = digest;
279    }
280
281    public void setTarLongFileMode(String tarLongFileMode) {
282        this.tarLongFileMode = tarLongFileMode;
283    }
284
285    public void setTarBigNumberMode(String tarBigNumberMode) {
286        this.tarBigNumberMode = tarBigNumberMode;
287    }
288
289    public void setIgnoreBrokenLinks(boolean ignore) {
290        this.ignoreBrokenLinks = ignore;
291    }
292
293    public void setOutputTimestampMs(Long outputTimestampMs) {
294        this.outputTimestampMs = outputTimestampMs;
295    }
296
297    /**
298     * Validates the input parameters.
299     */
300    public void validate() throws PackagingException {
301        if (control == null || !control.isDirectory()) {
302            throw new PackagingException("The 'control' attribute doesn't point to a directory. " + control);
303        }
304
305        if (changesEnabled) {
306            if (changesIn != null) {
307
308                if (changesIn.exists() && (!changesIn.isFile() || !changesIn.canRead())) {
309                    throw new PackagingException("The 'changesIn' setting needs to point to a readable file. " + changesIn + " was not found/readable.");
310                }
311
312                if (changesOut != null && !isWritableFile(changesOut)) {
313                    throw new PackagingException("Cannot write the output for 'changesOut' to " + changesOut);
314                }
315
316                if (changesSave != null && !isWritableFile(changesSave)) {
317                    throw new PackagingException("Cannot write the output for 'changesSave' to " + changesSave);
318                }
319
320            } else {
321                if (changesOut != null || changesSave != null) {
322                    throw new PackagingException("The 'changesOut' or 'changesSave' settings may only be used when there is a 'changesIn' specified.");
323                }
324            }
325        }
326
327        if (Compression.toEnum(compression) == null) {
328            throw new PackagingException("The compression method '" + compression + "' is not supported (expected 'none', 'gzip', 'bzip2' or 'xz')");
329        }
330
331        if (deb == null) {
332            throw new PackagingException("You need to specify where the deb file is supposed to be created.");
333        }
334
335        PGPSigner.getDigestCode(digest);
336    }
337
338    public void makeDeb() throws PackagingException {
339        BinaryPackageControlFile packageControlFile;
340        try {
341            console.info("Creating debian package: " + deb);
342
343            // If we should sign the package
344            if (signPackage) {
345
346                if (keyring == null || !keyring.exists()) {
347                    console.warn("Signing requested, but no keyring supplied");
348                }
349
350                if (key == null) {
351                    console.warn("Signing requested, but no key supplied");
352                }
353
354                if (passphrase == null) {
355                    console.warn("Signing requested, but no passphrase supplied");
356                }
357
358                final int digestCode = PGPSigner.getDigestCode(signDigest);
359
360                PGPSigner signer;
361                try (FileInputStream keyRingInput = new FileInputStream(keyring)) {
362                    signer = new PGPSigner(keyRingInput, key, passphrase, digestCode);
363                }
364
365                PGPSignatureGenerator signatureGenerator = new PGPSignatureGenerator(new BcPGPContentSignerBuilder(signer.getSecretKey().getPublicKey().getAlgorithm(), digestCode));
366                signatureGenerator.init(PGPSignature.BINARY_DOCUMENT, signer.getPrivateKey());
367
368                packageControlFile = createSignedDeb(Compression.toEnum(compression), signatureGenerator, signer);
369            } else {
370                packageControlFile = createDeb(Compression.toEnum(compression));
371            }
372
373        } catch (Exception e) {
374            throw new PackagingException("Failed to create debian package " + deb, e);
375        }
376
377        if(changesEnabled)
378        {
379            makeChangesFiles(packageControlFile);
380        }
381    }
382
383    private void makeChangesFiles(final BinaryPackageControlFile packageControlFile) throws PackagingException {
384        if (changesOut == null) {
385            changesOut = new File(deb.getParentFile(), FilenameUtils.getBaseName(deb.getName()) + ".changes");
386        }
387
388        ChangesProvider changesProvider;
389        FileOutputStream out = null;
390
391        try {
392            console.info("Creating changes file: " + changesOut);
393
394            changesOut.getParentFile().mkdirs();
395
396            out = new FileOutputStream(changesOut);
397
398            if (changesIn != null && changesIn.exists()) {
399                // read the changes form a textfile provider
400                changesProvider = new TextfileChangesProvider(new FileInputStream(changesIn), packageControlFile, outputTimestampMs, encoding);
401            } else {
402                // create an empty changelog
403                changesProvider = new ChangesProvider() {
404                    public ChangeSet[] getChangesSets() {
405                        return new ChangeSet[] {
406                                new ChangeSet(packageControlFile.get("Package"),
407                                        packageControlFile.get("Version"),
408                                        outputTimestampMs == null ? new Date() : new Date(outputTimestampMs),
409                                        packageControlFile.get("Distribution"),
410                                        packageControlFile.get("Urgency"),
411                                        packageControlFile.get("Maintainer"),
412                                        new String[0])
413                        };
414                    }
415                };
416            }
417
418            ChangesFileBuilder builder = new ChangesFileBuilder(outputTimestampMs);
419            ChangesFile changesFile = builder.createChanges(packageControlFile, deb, changesProvider);
420
421            final int digestCode = PGPSigner.getDigestCode(signDigest);
422
423            // (signChanges || signPackage) - for backward compatibility. signPackage is signing both changes and deb.
424            if ((signChanges || signPackage) && keyring != null && key != null && passphrase != null) {
425                console.info("Signing the changes file with the key " + key);
426                PGPSigner signer = new PGPSigner(new FileInputStream(keyring), key, passphrase, digestCode);
427                signer.clearSign(changesFile.toString(), out);
428            } else {
429                out.write(changesFile.toString().getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8));
430            }
431            out.flush();
432
433        } catch (Exception e) {
434            throw new PackagingException("Failed to create the Debian changes file " + changesOut, e);
435        } finally {
436            IOUtils.closeQuietly(out);
437        }
438
439        if (changesSave == null || !(changesProvider instanceof TextfileChangesProvider)) {
440            return;
441        }
442
443        try {
444            console.info("Saving changes to file: " + changesSave);
445
446            ((TextfileChangesProvider) changesProvider).save(new FileOutputStream(changesSave));
447
448        } catch (Exception e) {
449            throw new PackagingException("Failed to save debian changes file " + changesSave, e);
450        }
451    }
452
453    private List<String> populateConffiles(Collection<DataProducer> producers) {
454        final List<String> result = new ArrayList<>();
455
456        if (producers == null || producers.isEmpty()) {
457            return result;
458        }
459
460        final DataConsumer receiver = new DataConsumer() {
461            public void onEachFile(InputStream input, TarArchiveEntry entry)  {
462                String tempConffileItem = entry.getName();
463
464                // Make sure the conffile path is absolute
465                if (tempConffileItem.startsWith(".")) {
466                    tempConffileItem = tempConffileItem.substring(1);
467                }
468                if (!tempConffileItem.startsWith("/")) {
469                    tempConffileItem = "/" + tempConffileItem;
470                }
471
472                console.info("Adding conffile: " + tempConffileItem);
473                result.add(tempConffileItem);
474            }
475
476            public void onEachLink(TarArchiveEntry entry)  {
477            }
478
479            public void onEachDir(TarArchiveEntry tarArchiveEntry)  {
480            }
481        };
482
483        try {
484            for (DataProducer data : producers) {
485                data.produce(receiver);
486            }
487        } catch(Exception e) {
488            //
489        }
490
491        return result;
492    }
493
494    /**
495     * Create the debian archive with from the provided control files and data producers.
496     *
497     * @param compression   the compression method used for the data file
498     * @return BinaryPackageControlFile
499     * @throws PackagingException
500     */
501    public BinaryPackageControlFile createDeb(Compression compression) throws PackagingException {
502        return createSignedDeb(compression, null, null);
503    }
504    /**
505     * Create the debian archive with from the provided control files and data producers.
506     *
507     * @param compression   the compression method used for the data file (gzip, bzip2 or anything else for no compression)
508     * @param signatureGenerator   the signature generator
509     *
510     * @return PackageDescriptor
511     * @throws PackagingException
512     */
513    public BinaryPackageControlFile createSignedDeb(Compression compression, final PGPSignatureGenerator signatureGenerator, PGPSigner signer ) throws PackagingException {
514        File tempData = null;
515        File tempControl = null;
516
517        try {
518            tempData = File.createTempFile("deb", "data");
519            tempControl = File.createTempFile("deb", "control");
520
521            console.debug("Building data");
522            DataBuilder dataBuilder = new DataBuilder(console, outputTimestampMs);
523            StringBuilder md5s = new StringBuilder();
524            TarOptions options = new TarOptions()
525                .compression(compression)
526                .longFileMode(tarLongFileMode)
527                .bigNumberMode(tarBigNumberMode);
528            BigInteger size = dataBuilder.buildData(dataProducers, tempData, md5s, options, ignoreBrokenLinks);
529
530            console.info("Building conffiles");
531            List<String> tempConffiles = populateConffiles(conffilesProducers);
532
533            console.debug("Building control");
534            ControlBuilder controlBuilder = new ControlBuilder(console, variableResolver, openReplaceToken, closeReplaceToken, outputTimestampMs);
535            BinaryPackageControlFile packageControlFile = controlBuilder.createPackageControlFile(new File(control, "control"), size, encoding, openReplaceToken, closeReplaceToken);
536            if (packageControlFile.get("Package") == null) {
537                packageControlFile.set("Package", packageName);
538            }
539            if (packageControlFile.get("Section") == null) {
540                packageControlFile.set("Section", section);
541            }
542            if (packageControlFile.get("Description") == null) {
543                packageControlFile.set("Description", description);
544            }
545            if (packageControlFile.get("Depends") == null) {
546                // Only add a depends entry to the control file if the field in this object has actually been set
547                if (depends != null && depends.length() > 0) {
548                    packageControlFile.set("Depends", depends);
549                }
550            }
551            if (packageControlFile.get("Homepage") == null) {
552                packageControlFile.set("Homepage", homepage);
553            }
554
555            controlBuilder.buildControl(packageControlFile, control.listFiles(), tempConffiles , md5s, tempControl, encoding);
556
557            if (!packageControlFile.isValid()) {
558                throw new PackagingException("Control file fields are invalid " + packageControlFile.invalidFields() +
559                        ". The following fields are mandatory: " + packageControlFile.getMandatoryFields() +
560                        ". Please check your pom.xml/build.xml and your control file.");
561            }
562
563            deb.getParentFile().mkdirs();
564
565            ArArchiveOutputStream ar = new ArArchiveOutputStream(new FileOutputStream(deb));
566
567            String binaryName = "debian-binary";
568            String binaryContent = "2.0\n";
569            String controlName = "control.tar.gz";
570            String dataName = "data.tar" + compression.getExtension();
571
572            addTo(ar, binaryName, binaryContent);
573            addTo(ar, controlName, tempControl);
574            addTo(ar, dataName, tempData);
575
576            if (signatureGenerator != null) {
577                console.info("Signing package with key " + key);
578
579                if(signRole == null) {
580                    signRole = "origin";
581                }
582
583                // Use debsig-verify as default
584                if (!"dpkg-sig".equals(signMethod)) {
585                    // Sign file to verify with debsig-verify
586                    PGPSignatureOutputStream sigStream = new PGPSignatureOutputStream(signatureGenerator);
587
588                    addTo(sigStream, binaryContent);
589                    addTo(sigStream, tempControl);
590                    addTo(sigStream, tempData);
591                    addTo(ar, "_gpg" + signRole, sigStream.generateASCIISignature());
592
593                } else {
594
595                    // Sign file to verify with dpkg-sig --verify
596                    final String outputStr =
597                            "Version: 4\n" +
598                                    "Signer: \n" +
599                                    "Date: " + new SimpleDateFormat("EEE MMM dd HH:mm:ss yyyy", Locale.ENGLISH).format(new Date()) + "\n" +
600                                    "Role: " + signRole +"\n" +
601                                    "Files: \n" +
602                                    addFile(binaryName, binaryContent) +
603                                    addFile(controlName, tempControl) +
604                                    addFile(dataName, tempData);
605
606                    ByteArrayOutputStream message = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
607                    signer.clearSign(outputStr, message);
608
609                    addTo(ar, "_gpg" + signRole, message.toString());
610                }
611            }
612
613            ar.close();
614
615            return packageControlFile;
616
617        } catch (Exception e) {
618            throw new PackagingException("Could not create deb package", e);
619        } finally {
620            if (tempData != null) {
621                if (!tempData.delete()) {
622                    console.warn("Could not delete the temporary file " + tempData);
623                }
624            }
625            if (tempControl != null) {
626                if (!tempControl.delete()) {
627                    console.warn("Could not delete the temporary file " + tempControl);
628                }
629            }
630        }
631    }
632
633    private String addFile(String name, String input){
634        return addLine(md5Hash(input), sha1Hash(input), input.length(), name);
635    }
636
637    private String addFile(String name, File input){
638        return addLine(md5Hash(input), sha1Hash(input), input.length(), name);
639    }
640
641    private String addLine(String md5, String sha1, long size, String name){
642        return "\t" + md5 + " " + sha1 + " " + size + " " + name + "\n";
643    }
644
645    private String md5Hash(String input){
646        return md5Hash(input.getBytes());
647    }
648
649    private String md5Hash(File input){
650        try {
651            return md5Hash(FileUtils.readFileToByteArray(input));
652        } catch (IOException e) {
653            // TODO Auto-generated catch block
654            e.printStackTrace();
655        }
656
657        return null;
658    }
659
660    private String md5Hash(byte[] input){
661        //update the input of MD5
662        MD5Digest md5 = new MD5Digest();
663        md5.update(input, 0, input.length);
664
665        //get the output/ digest size and hash it
666        byte[] digest = new byte[md5.getDigestSize()];
667        md5.doFinal(digest, 0);
668
669        return new String(Hex.encode(digest));
670    }
671
672    private String sha1Hash(String input){
673        return sha1Hash(input.getBytes());
674    }
675
676    private String sha1Hash(File input){
677        try {
678            return sha1Hash(FileUtils.readFileToByteArray(input));
679        } catch (IOException e) {
680            // TODO Auto-generated catch block
681            e.printStackTrace();
682        }
683
684        return null;
685    }
686
687    private String sha1Hash(byte[] input){
688        try
689        {
690            //prepare the input
691            MessageDigest hash = MessageDigest.getInstance(digest);
692            hash.update(input);
693
694            //proceed ....
695            byte[] digest = hash.digest();
696
697            return new String(Hex.encode(digest));
698        }
699        catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException e)
700        {
701            System.err.println("No such algorithm");
702            e.printStackTrace();
703        }
704
705        return null;
706    }
707
708    private void addTo(ArArchiveOutputStream pOutput, String pName, String pContent) throws IOException {
709        final byte[] content = pContent.getBytes();
710        ArArchiveEntry archiveEntry = createArArchiveEntry(pName, content.length);
711
712        pOutput.putArchiveEntry(archiveEntry);
713        pOutput.write(content);
714        pOutput.closeArchiveEntry();
715    }
716
717    private void addTo(ArArchiveOutputStream pOutput, String pName, File pContent) throws IOException {
718        ArArchiveEntry archiveEntry = createArArchiveEntry(pName, pContent.length());
719
720        pOutput.putArchiveEntry(archiveEntry);
721                try (InputStream input = new FileInputStream(pContent)) {
722            Utils.copy(input, pOutput);
723        }
724
725        pOutput.closeArchiveEntry();
726    }
727
728    private void addTo(final PGPSignatureOutputStream pOutput, final String pContent) throws IOException {
729        final byte[] content = pContent.getBytes();
730        pOutput.write(content);
731    }
732
733    private void addTo(final PGPSignatureOutputStream pOutput, final File pContent) throws IOException {
734        try (InputStream input = new FileInputStream(pContent)) {
735            Utils.copy(input, pOutput);
736        }
737    }
738
739    public void setOpenReplaceToken(String openReplaceToken) {
740        this.openReplaceToken = openReplaceToken;
741    }
742
743    public void setCloseReplaceToken(String closeReplaceToken) {
744        this.closeReplaceToken = closeReplaceToken;
745    }
746
747    private ArArchiveEntry createArArchiveEntry(String pName, long contentLength) {
748        if (outputTimestampMs != null) {
749            return new ArArchiveEntry(pName, contentLength, 0, 0, DEFAULT_MODE, outputTimestampMs / TimeUnit.SECONDS.toMillis(1));
750        }
751
752        return new ArArchiveEntry(pName, contentLength);
753    }
754}
